Hi
I use "@Test(expected =3D AnyClassException.class") and one
"assertTrue(=
false)" together for example following code:

@Test(expected =3D ArrayIndex=
OutOfBoundsException.class)
public void test()
{
  String s[] =3D new Strin=
g[]{"1"};
  assertTrue(false);
  System.out.println(s[10]);
}

I expect to =
see an assertion but I see following error:
java.lang.Exception: Unexpected=
 exception,
expected<java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException> but
was<java=
.lang.AssertionError>=85.

In your opinion, this test must be Assertion or =
Exception.

lass")

t be failed for "assertion" and not for
